page.t: change event news availability: %0 race=%1 sector=%2 jumps=%3

page.title: Mainprogram output
page.descr: EXE strings such as error messages

page.title: Female Atmo
page.descr: Friendly female voice for atmospheric messages (lots of echo)
page.t: If you bring any creatures on board, please make sure they are chained. Any loose animals will be vaporised on sight.
We have reports of an outbreak of argon flu in this sector, would all visitors please report to the medic bay for inoculation.

page.title: ArcaJeth.SMS
page.t: [author]Station Management System[/author]\033GSMS Mini started:\033X %s\n\(to start the Standard-Version you have to adjust the ...(Resource price) using the SMS-Configuration.\)

[author]Station Management System[/author]\033GAdvice:\033X Thank you for adjusting the ...(RPs) of your station: %s. The additional fee of %s Credits has been deducted and the management \(SMS Standard\) started.
[author]Station Management System[/author]\033RAdvice:\033X Because you did not pay your debts of \033R%s Credits\033X, I had no other choice than detaining your station %s\nMay profit go with you.

page.title: Revens Scripts
page.t:
[center][b]Argon Navy Merchant Marine Program[/b][/center]

[justify][b]From:[/b] Admiralty of the Argon Navy
[b]To:[/b] %s
[b]Re:[/b] Cost of Merchant Marine Transport Report

The Admiralty of the Argon Navy regret to inform you that your current credit balance is insufficient to pay for a report on the current status of our merchant marine military transports.

The cost of this report is %s credits. This money helps defray the costs of maintaining liaison officers and transporting military personnel to local trading and equipment docks throughout Argon space. Your ongoing support will ensure that we are able to continue this program.

We thank you for your understanding.

page.title: Script Command Names
page.t: %0 get notoriety require to buy ware: %1
